modules.description: This module provides syntactic extensions for Lwt programming, enabling concise handling of asynchronous operations using `let%lwt`, `match%lwt`, and similar constructs. It works with Lwt's `('a, 'b) result` type and promises, simplifying chaining and error handling. Concrete use cases include writing non-blocking I/O operations, such as reading from or writing to network sockets, and managing asynchronous workflows in web servers or event-driven applications.
